raw_comment:
•  What do you notice?
It notice that from the age 15 to 24, they believe that world is getting better and some others maybe not as much
•  What do you wonder? 
I wonder what date they would get of they did the age range between maybe, 40 to 70 i’m sure that would change the date a little bit. 
•  How does this relate to you and your community?
This relates to me because I do believe the world is getting better slowly. 
•  What’s going on in this graph? Create a catchy headline that captures the graph’s main idea.
“Is the world getting better?, says 15 to 24 year-olds.”
ace_sentences: The graph shows data about people from 15 years to 24 years.
Many people from 15 years to 24 years believe that the world is getting better.
Some people from 15 years to 24 years do not believe that the world is getting better as much.
I wonder what data the graph would show for people from 40 years to 70 years.
I think that the data would change a little bit if the age range was from 40 years to 70 years.
I believe that the world is getting better slowly.
The headline is: Is the world getting better, says 15 to 24 year-olds?
